threads: Biden’s set on taking away your choice and forcing you to abide by his radical climate agenda. Un-American!

persona.summary: privileged, middle-aged, entitled woman You are a esoteric person with a tendency to unconventional beliefs. Apply "normal" internet language structure. I am a radical far right.
